verses.verse: כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me הָל֞וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> unto me Go וְקָנִ֤יתָ <S%H7069><s%> and get לְּךָ֙ אֵז֣וֹר <S%H232><s%> girdle פִּשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6593><s%> thee a linen וְשַׂמְתּ֖וֹ <S%H7760><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around מָתְנֶ֑יךָ <S%H4975><s%> it upon thy loins וּבַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> it not in water לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תְבִאֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> and put

וָאֶקְנֶ֥ה <S%H7069><s%> So I got אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵז֖וֹר <S%H232><s%> a girdle כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וָאָשִׂ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> around מָתְנָֽי׃ <S%H4975><s%> [it] on my loins ס

וַיְהִ֧י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me שֵׁנִ֥ית <S%H8145><s%> came unto me the second time לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵז֛וֹר <S%H232><s%> the girdle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which קָנִ֖יתָ <S%H7069><s%> that thou hast got אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is around מָתְנֶ֑יךָ <S%H4975><s%> which [is] upon thy loins וְקוּם֙ <S%H6965><s%> and arise לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go פְּרָ֔תָה <S%H6578><s%> to Euphrates וְטָמְנֵ֥הוּ <S%H2934><s%> and hide שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בִּנְקִ֥יק <S%H5357><s%> it there in a hole הַסָּֽלַע׃ <S%H5553><s%> of the rock

וָאֵלֵ֕ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וָאֶטְמְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H2934><s%> and hid בִּפְרָ֑ת <S%H6578><s%> it by Euphrates כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> to pass מִקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> And it came to pass after יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me ק֚וּם <S%H6965><s%> unto me Arise לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go פְּרָ֔תָה <S%H6578><s%> to Euphrates וְקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> and take מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֵז֔וֹר <S%H232><s%> the girdle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּיתִ֖יךָ <S%H6680><s%> from thence which I commanded לְטָמְנוֹ־ <S%H2934><s%> thee to hide שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וָאֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went פְּרָ֔תָה <S%H6578><s%> to Euphrates וָאֶחְפֹּ֗ר <S%H2658><s%> and digged וָֽאֶקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אֵז֔וֹר <S%H232><s%> the girdle מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> from the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I טְמַנְתִּ֣יו <S%H2934><s%> where I had hid שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> it וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and lo נִשְׁחַ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> was marred הָאֵז֔וֹר <S%H232><s%> it and behold the girdle לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִצְלַ֖ח <S%H6743><s%> it was profitable לַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> totally פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Then the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּ֠כָה <S%H3602><s%> Just אַשְׁחִ֞ית <S%H7843><s%> After this manner will I mar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּא֧וֹן <S%H1347><s%> the pride יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּא֥וֹן <S%H1347><s%> pride יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הָרָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> and the great

הָעָם֩ <S%H5971><s%> people הַזֶּ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> he הָרָ֜ע <S%H7451><s%> This evil הַֽמֵּאֲנִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3987><s%> which refuse לִשְׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרַ֗י <S%H1697><s%> my words הַהֹֽלְכִים֙ <S%H1980><s%> which walk בִּשְׁרִר֣וּת <S%H8307><s%> in the imagination לִבָּ֔ם <S%H3820><s%> of their heart וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> gone אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other לְעָבְדָ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> to serve וּלְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <S%H7812><s%> them and to worship לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וִיהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּאֵז֣וֹר <S%H232><s%> them shall even be as this girdle הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִצְלַ֖ח <S%H6743><s%> which is good לַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> is totally

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after יִדְבַּ֨ק <S%H1692><s%> cleaveth הָאֵז֜וֹר <S%H232><s%> For as the girdle אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָתְנֵי־ <S%H4975><s%> to the loins אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so הִדְבַּ֣קְתִּי <S%H1692><s%> so have I caused to cleave אֵ֠לַי <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> unto me the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and the whole בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> and the whole house יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לִי֙ לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> that they might be unto me for a people וּלְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and for a name וְלִתְהִלָּ֖ה <S%H8416><s%> and for a praise וּלְתִפְאָ֑רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and for a glory וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמֵֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> but they would not hear

וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thou shalt speak אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> unto them this word הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> he ס כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every נֵ֖בֶל <S%H5035><s%> Every bottle יִמָּ֣לֵא <S%H4390><s%> shall be filled יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> with wine וְאָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and they shall say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you הֲיָדֹ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> unto thee Do we not certainly לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נֵדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> know כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every נֵ֖בֶל <S%H5035><s%> that every bottle יִמָּ֥לֵא <S%H4390><s%> shall be filled יָֽיִן׃ <S%H3196><s%> banqueting

וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H559><s%> Then shalt thou say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> I am about מְמַלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> Behold I will fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> all the inhabitants הָאָ֪רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of this land הַזֹּ֟את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> even the kings הַיֹּשְׁבִים֩ <S%H3427><s%> that sit לְדָוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> upon David's עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֜וֹ <S%H3678><s%> throne וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> and the prophets וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem שִׁכָּרֽוֹן׃ <S%H7943><s%> with drunkenness

וְנִפַּצְתִּים֩ <S%H5310><s%> And I will dash אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> them one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אָחִ֜יו <S%H251><s%> against another וְהָאָב֧וֹת <S%H1><s%> even the fathers וְהַבָּנִ֛ים <S%H1121><s%> and the sons יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> together נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶחְמ֧וֹל <S%H2550><s%> I will not pity וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor אָח֛וּס <S%H2347><s%> nor spare וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֲרַחֵ֖ם <S%H7355><s%> nor have mercy מֵהַשְׁחִיתָֽם׃ <S%H7843><s%> but destroy ס

שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear וְהַאֲזִ֖ינוּ <S%H238><s%> ye and give ear אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּגְבָּ֑הוּ <S%H1361><s%> be not proud כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken

תְּנוּ֩ <S%H5414><s%> Give לַיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H430><s%> your God כָּבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> glory בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before יַחְשִׁ֔ךְ <S%H2821><s%> before he cause darkness וּבְטֶ֛רֶם <S%H2962><s%> and before יִֽתְנַגְּפ֥וּ <S%H5062><s%> stumble רַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H7272><s%> and before your feet עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָ֣רֵי <S%H2022><s%> mountains נָ֑שֶׁף <S%H5399><s%> upon the dark וְקִוִּיתֶ֤ם <S%H6960><s%> and while ye look לְאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> for light וְשָׂמָ֣הּ <S%H7760><s%> he turn לְצַלְמָ֔וֶת <S%H6757><s%> it into the shadow of death [יָשִׁית כ] (וְשִׁ֖ית <S%H7896><s%> apply ק) לַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <S%H6205><s%> [it] gross darkness

וְאִם֙ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׁמָע֔וּהָ <S%H8085><s%> But if ye will not hear בְּמִסְתָּרִ֥ים <S%H4565><s%> in secret places תִּבְכֶּֽה־ <S%H1058><s%> shall weep נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> it my soul מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> for גֵוָ֑ה <S%H1466><s%> [your] pride וְדָמֹ֨עַ <S%H1830><s%> shall weep תִּדְמַ֜ע <S%H1830><s%> sore וְתֵרַ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> and run down עֵינִי֙ <S%H5869><s%> and mine eye דִּמְעָ֔ה <S%H1832><s%> with tears כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <S%H7617><s%> is carried away captive עֵ֥דֶר <S%H5739><s%> flock יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD'S ס

אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Say לַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king וְלַגְּבִירָ֖ה <S%H1377><s%> and to the queen הַשְׁפִּ֣ילוּ <S%H8213><s%> Humble שֵׁ֑בוּ <S%H3427><s%> yourselves sit down כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יָרַד֙ <S%H3381><s%> shall come down מַרְאֲשׁ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4761><s%> for your principalities עֲטֶ֖רֶת <S%H5850><s%> [even] the crown תִּֽפְאַרְתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H8597><s%> of your glory

עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> The cities הַנֶּ֛גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south סֻגְּר֖וּ <S%H5462><s%> shall be shut up וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there פֹּתֵ֑חַ <S%H6605><s%> and none shall open הָגְלָ֧ת <S%H1540><s%> shall be carried away captive יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> [them] Judah כֻּלָּ֖הּ <S%H3605><s%> All הָגְלָ֥ת <S%H1540><s%> carried away captive שְׁלוֹמִֽים׃ <S%H7965><s%> all of it it shall be wholly ס

[שְׂאִי כ] (שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> accept ק) עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> your eyes [וּרְאִי כ] (וּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> advise self ק) הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> them that come מִצָּפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> from the north אַיֵּ֗ה <S%H346><s%> Where הָעֵ֙דֶר֙ <S%H5739><s%> where [is] the flock נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> [that] was given לָ֔ךְ צֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> cattle תִּפְאַרְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H8597><s%> thee thy beautiful
